message.body: Hey. I know you're going to the mall today, but did phuong invite you out to do something later today? Because she totally invited Sam out for a drink in front of me and Michael when you were on the porch.
Yeah. She did. She said "you're going shopping tomorrow right, if you get done early, come out!"
Ok. I was just curious. I thought it was annoying.
Oh it totally is. She doesn't care about if she does it to someone but god forbid if someone does it to her.
I hear ya. I don't think I will be going out with her.
Anymore? And even if I get home early, I won't be going. I don't think Sam will either. It didn't seem like she was too interested.
Haha. Not anymore. Just today in particular.
Oh. Hahaha. Okay! Yeah, she's being a little unreasonable, but it doesn't seem like she was being cold yesterday.
